attributes.action: Speed cameras are a source of money for the government, not a safety measure to reduce accidents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Speed cameras draw in hundreds of thousands of pounds each year for the government. They were put in place as a safety measure, to reduce accidents - not to make money. In fact, figures show that speed cameras increase the number and severity of road accidents.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
